header_text: You're in the middle of a conversation with friends when you struggle to recall the name of a movie. It's uncomfortable to experience these lapses in memory, leaving you wondering if something more concerning is happening. Despite your discomfort, you look around at your friends and remember that there are people in your life that are supportive.
